name: Vampire Vanquisher
description:
Embark on a journey to save a medieval village from a group of evil vampires by collecting spells, swords, and shields used to defeat enemies and fight bosses by solving puzzles and facing platforming challenges. Start in the village, and journey throughout a dark forest to find your way to an epic castle, defeating three bosses in addition to many other enemies along the way.

---

This is a short game made for my game programming class, made in the span of eight weeks with a group of two other people. Credit goes equally to all group members involved.
